name: Super Mario Shockwave (Dev testing)
description:
3d styled fangame im making, very very WIP
inspired by other fangames like SM63, SRB2 and PSF

controls:
left/right - move
down - dive
z - jump
x - attack
shift - ground pound
plus and minus - change zoom
q and e - change object
backslash - reset

https://discord.gg/zA66BYs3A8
go to the discord and tell me what to add (you can share levels too !!)
